name: Rivaroxaban
description: Dosing : 15 mg once daily with food

name: Atorvastatin
description: Due to the high protein binding, atorvastatin is not expected to be cleared by dialysis

name: Ceftriaxone
description: Use with caution : Abnormal gallbladder sonograms have been reported, possibly due to ceftriaxone-calcium precipitates

name: Ceftriaxone
description: Use with caution in patients with a history of GI disease, especially colitis

name: Ceftriaxone
description: Dosing : 50 to 100 mg/kg/day in 1 to 2 divided doses every 12 to 24 hours (maximum: 2,000 mg daily)

name: Cetirizine
description: Dosing : Initial 2.5 mg once daily; may be increased to a maximum dose of 2.5 mg every 12 hours or 5 mg once daily

name: Cetirizine
description: Dosing : 2.5 mg once daily; may increase to a maximum dose of 2.5 mg every 12 hours if needed

name: Cetirizine
description: Dosing : 5 mg once daily; 5 mg 3 times per week may also be effective.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Use only when strictly needed and for the shortest duration possible

name: Clopidogrel
description: Should consider the risk of infant exposure, the benefits of breastfeeding to the infant, and benefits of treatment to the mother.
